bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to define the business of abstracting. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 36-13 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: For purposes of this chapter, the term, business of abstracting, and any derivative thereof, means: (1) Making, compiling, and certifying abstracts of public records or other records of instruments affecting the title to real estate, which are of record or on file in the office of the register of deeds of the county in which the real estate is located; (2) Examining abstracts of public records or other records of instruments affecting the title to real estate for the purpose of ascertaining the condition and status of the title and any holder of record title to the real estate; and (3) Issuing written certificates or statements of title or similar instruments stating the condition and status of title to real estate and the holder of record title to real estate, subject to any exceptions or qualifications set forth in any such instrument. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
